mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ENTRY_SEL_MASTER (RCRT_NO, COURSE_DIV, NTH_CODE, COURSE_NAME, ENT_YEAR, TERM_DIV, EDU_START_DATE, EDU_END_DATE, COURSE_MONTH, STATUS_DIV, NOTE) VALUES
(#{recruitment.rcrtNo}, #{recruitment.courseDiv}, #{recruitment.nthCode}, #{recruitment.courseName}, #{recruitment.entYear}, #{recruitment.termDiv}, #{recruitment.eduStartDate}, #{recruitment.eduEndDate}, #{recruitment.courseMonth}, #{recruitment.statusDiv}, #{recruitment.note})
